main event: An observation of an elongated red flashing object near Caribou, Maine, on August 1, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as elongated (2ft x 10 inch) and red with flashing lights., It was observed flying in level flight from East to West during the day., The object reportedly exploded and fell after one minute of observation., Thirteen persons happened to look at the object simultaneously., Insufficient data was available for further evaluation.
witness description: Civilian, Supervisor of Maintenance at Sanatorio
